mapper.delete: update devops_pipeline_job_record set status = 'canceled' where pipeline_record_id = #{pipelineRecordId} and (status = 'created' or status = 'pending')
mapper.select: select * from devops_pipeline_job_record dpjr where dpjr.status = 'pending' order by id asc limit #{number}
select * from devops_pipeline_job_record dpjr where dpjr.stage_record_id = #{stageRecordId} for update
mapper.update: update devops_pipeline_job_record set status = 'running' where id = #{id} and status = 'pending'
update devops_pipeline_job_record set status = 'created' where id = #{id} and status = 'canceled'
